mapper.select: SELECT user_id, user_nickname, user_avatar_url, user_activate_time FROM user_table WHERE user_name=#{username} AND user_password=#{password}
SELECT user_id, user_name, user_nickname, user_email, user_avatar_url, user_register_time, user_activate_time FROM user_table WHERE id=#{id}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_table WHERE user_name=#{username}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_table (user_id, user_name, user_password, user_nickname, user_email, user_avatar_url, user_register_time, user_activate_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{email}, #{avatar_url}, #{register_time}, #{activate_time})
